price: Msiwadhanie walio kufuru kwamba watashinda katika nchi. Na makaazi yao ni Motoni, na hakika ni maovu kweli marejeo yao.
arabic: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Usidhani kuwa makafiri wataweza kumkwepa Mwenyezi Mungu asiwashike kwa madhambi yao, au watu wa Haki wasiwaone pahala popote pale katika ardhi. Bali Yeye ni Muweza, na marejeo yao Siku ya Kiyama ni Motoni. Na marejeo maovu kabisa ni marejeo yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: lā taḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū muʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamawāhumu al-nāru walabi'sa al-maṣīru
